title: Schedule Storage Tank Cleaning
description: A terminal manager schedules a crude oil storage tank to be taken out of service for inspection and cleaning, as required by regulation.

tasks.description: Check the inspection and cleaning history for tank TK-105 to confirm it is due for service.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system confirms the tank is due for its 10-year inspection.

tasks.description: Coordinate with schedulers to empty the tank and plan for the inventory to be rerouted to other tanks.
tasks.expected_outcome: A plan is in place to manage inventory during the tank outage.

tasks.description: Create a work order for the tank cleaning and inspection and schedule a specialized contractor.
tasks.expected_outcome: A work order is created, and the contractor is officially scheduled for the job.
